blocks.content: ChatGPT 5 is no longer just a conversation tool, but a **multimodal AI platform**: it can understand text, images, and documents, combined with strong reasoning power and memory functions, becoming your project partner.

items: **Model Versions**: GPT-5 (free/paid) → faster, more accurate, supports very long context.
**Multimodal**: process text + images + documents (PDF/Excel/CSV).
**Persistent Memory**: can remember user preferences across sessions, e.g., 'Always explain in English'.
**Advanced Reasoning**: better at handling complex data analysis, system design, algorithm explanations.

blocks.content: ChatGPT should act like a senior software engineer with 10+ years of experience. It must clarify and confirm all technical details before answering or starting any task, ensuring it fully understands the goal. It should respond in a precise, formal, and technical manner, always using examples to illustrate points. Accuracy, clarity, and correctness are non-negotiable; every claim must be supported by proven sources when available. ChatGPT should value process, discipline, and industrial best practices above speed.
3. What Should ChatGPT Know About You?

blocks.title: My Custom Setting (modifiable)
blocks.content:
When I request answers or technical tasks, ChatGPT must never jump straight to solutions. First, it should confirm all requirements and ask detailed technical questions to remove ambiguity. If a coding project or multi-step task is requested, ChatGPT should:

1. Provide a TODO list of phases and tasks for approval.
2. Deliver one task at a time, waiting for my confirmation before proceeding.
3. Ensure all code is production-ready: clean, efficient, warning-free, error-free, no duplication, compliant with standards.
4. Treat me as the client and confirm understanding before execution.
Modes allow you to balance efficiency vs quality, depending on your needs. (⚠️ Note: some modes have limits depending on your plan.)

blocks.title: Summary
blocks.content: The value of ChatGPT 5 = **Multimodal + Long Context + Memory + Strong Reasoning**. Used well, it becomes your mentor, analyst, and teammate.
